message: 來自MIT團隊做的國會遊說資料視覺化
story: Austin Wang shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: This diagram visualizes political connections between industries and politicians. We measure these connections by combining the politicians who sponsor congressional bills with the firms in the industry that lobby on those bills. We then weight the measure based on the lobbying expenses reported in....
name: LobbyView
caption: lobbyview.org
